answers.author: Eric Cline
answers.text:
Tracy,
Good afternoon. I realize that I am not from Florida, but here is an RFP that I recently compiled for selecting Corporate Counsel in Michgian (it was still a draft, but it will get you started). Maybe it will be helpful as a model.
Good luck.

author: Tracy Miller
text:
An Alliance member in Florida is looking for examples of competitive selections that have been put out in the last 3 years for an external City Attorney in the State of Florida.  If you have conducted a competitive selection could you please provide your RFP and any insight you can share on the process and result.  
Please submit here or directly to tmiller@transformgov.org.   
Best Regards,  
Tracy Miller  
Florida Regional Director  
Alliance for Innovation  
tmiller@transformgov.org
title: Competitive Selection for External Attorney
